entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
